verbs.description: The historic summit [V: will] occur on June 12 in Singapore , according to a tweet by President Trump .
[ARG1: The historic summit] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: occur] [ARGM-TMP: on June 12] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a tweet by President Trump] .
The historic summit will occur on June 12 in Singapore , [V: according] to a tweet by President Trump .
